p: The total flavonoid content in the methanol and aqueous extracts of the spices was determined by aluminum chloride colorimetric method based on the method indicated by Ordonez et al. (2006). Briefly, a volume of 0.5 mL of AlCl 3ethanol solution (2%) was added to 0.5 mL of extract. After one hour incubation at room temperature, the absorbance was measured at 420 nm using UV-Vis spectrophotometer. The analysis was performed in triplicate. The total flavonoid content was estimated from a quercetin standard curve and the results are expressed as mg quercetin equivalents (mg QE/100 g −1 Extract DW; r 2 = 0.9675).
